data.message: This album is so fuckin awesome <3

real stans likes all his shit 
i love all his albums
i dont care about which album was the best mmlp2 has some AWESOME songs in my opinion BUT there was albums that i loved like infinite , sslp

slim shady, marshall mathers 1, eminem show, devils night, d12 world, encore, relapse, re-up.... are the best of the best... relapse refill, recovery and this seem tame.  dont get me wrong, still gonna probably get the new cd... since it doesnt have lil wayne or drake or kayne west on it... still hopeing for a diss in the near future.
I liked encore that was a top album
i honestly can say i dont like 100% of his songs.  to be even more honest... bad guy should have had a single.  best song on there.
